backing-store.h

5#ifndef V8_OBJECTS_BACKING_STORE_H_
6#define V8_OBJECTS_BACKING_STORE_H_
7
8#include <memory>
9
10#include "include/v8-array-buffer.h"
11#include "include/v8-internal.h"
12#include "src/base/optional.h"
13#include "src/handles/handles.h"
14
15namespace v8 {
16namespace internal {
17
18class Isolate;
19class WasmMemoryObject;
20
21// Whether this is Wasm memory, and if 32 or 64 bit.
22enum class WasmMemoryFlag : uint8_t { kNotWasm, kWasmMemory32, kWasmMemory64 };
23
24// Whether the backing store is shared or not.
25enum class SharedFlag : uint8_t { kNotShared, kShared };
26
27// Whether the backing store is resizable or not.
28enum class ResizableFlag : uint8_t { kNotResizable, kResizable };
29
30// Whether the backing store memory is initialied to zero or not.
31enum class InitializedFlag : uint8_t { kUninitialized, kZeroInitialized };
32
33// Internal information for shared wasm memories. E.g. contains
34// a list of all memory objects (across all isolates) that share this
35// backing store.
36struct SharedWasmMemoryData;
37
38// The {BackingStore} data structure stores all the low-level details about the
39// backing store of an array buffer or Wasm memory, including its base address
40// and length, whether it is shared, provided by the embedder, has guard
41// regions, etc. Instances of this classes *own* the underlying memory
42// when they are created through one of the {Allocate()} methods below,
43// and the destructor frees the memory (and page allocation if necessary).
44class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE BackingStore : public BackingStoreBase {
45 public:
46 ~BackingStore();
47
48 // Allocate an array buffer backing store using the default method,
49 // which currently is the embedder-provided array buffer allocator.
50 static std::unique_ptr<BackingStore> Allocate(Isolate* isolate,
51 size_t byte_length,
52 SharedFlag shared,
53 InitializedFlag initialized);
54
55#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
56 // Allocate the backing store for a Wasm memory.
57 static std::unique_ptr<BackingStore> AllocateWasmMemory(
58 Isolate* isolate, size_t initial_pages, size_t maximum_pages,
59 WasmMemoryFlag wasm_memory, SharedFlag shared);
60#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
61
62 // Tries to allocate `maximum_pages` of memory and commit `initial_pages`.
63 //
64 // If {isolate} is not null, initial failure to allocate the backing store may
65 // trigger GC, after which the allocation is retried. If {isolate} is null, no
66 // GC will be triggered.
67 static std::unique_ptr<BackingStore> TryAllocateAndPartiallyCommitMemory(
68 Isolate* isolate, size_t byte_length, size_t max_byte_length,
69 size_t page_size, size_t initial_pages, size_t maximum_pages,
70 WasmMemoryFlag wasm_memory, SharedFlag shared);
71
72 // Create a backing store that wraps existing allocated memory.
73 static std::unique_ptr<BackingStore> WrapAllocation(
74 void* allocation_base, size_t allocation_length,
75 v8::BackingStore::DeleterCallback deleter, void* deleter_data,
76 SharedFlag shared);
77
78 // Create an empty backing store.
79 static std::unique_ptr<BackingStore> EmptyBackingStore(SharedFlag shared);
80
81 // Accessors.
82 void* buffer_start() const { return buffer_start_; }
83 size_t byte_length(
84 std::memory_order memory_order = std::memory_order_relaxed) const {
85 return byte_length_.load(memory_order);
86 }
87 size_t max_byte_length() const { return max_byte_length_; }
88 size_t byte_capacity() const { return byte_capacity_; }
89 bool is_shared() const { return is_shared_; }
90 bool is_resizable_by_js() const { return is_resizable_by_js_; }
91 bool is_wasm_memory() const { return is_wasm_memory_; }
92 bool has_guard_regions() const { return has_guard_regions_; }
93
94 bool IsEmpty() const {
95 DCHECK_GE(byte_capacity_, byte_length_);
96 return byte_capacity_ == 0;
97 }
98
99 enum ResizeOrGrowResult { kSuccess, kFailure, kRace };
100
101 ResizeOrGrowResult ResizeInPlace(Isolate* isolate, size_t new_byte_length);
102 ResizeOrGrowResult GrowInPlace(Isolate* isolate, size_t new_byte_length);
103
104 bool CanReallocate() const {
105 return !is_wasm_memory_ && !custom_deleter_ && !globally_registered_ &&
106 !is_resizable_by_js_ && buffer_start_ != nullptr;
107 }
108
109 // Wrapper around ArrayBuffer::Allocator::Reallocate.
110 bool Reallocate(Isolate* isolate, size_t new_byte_length);
111
112#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
113 // Attempt to grow this backing store in place.
114 base::Optional<size_t> GrowWasmMemoryInPlace(Isolate* isolate,
115 size_t delta_pages,
116 size_t max_pages);
117
118 // Allocate a new, larger, backing store for this Wasm memory and copy the
119 // contents of this backing store into it.
120 std::unique_ptr<BackingStore> CopyWasmMemory(Isolate* isolate,
121 size_t new_pages,
122 size_t max_pages,
123 WasmMemoryFlag wasm_memory);
124
125 // Attach the given memory object to this backing store. The memory object
126 // will be updated if this backing store is grown.
127 void AttachSharedWasmMemoryObject(Isolate* isolate,
128 Handle<WasmMemoryObject> memory_object);
129
130 // Send asynchronous updates to attached memory objects in other isolates
131 // after the backing store has been grown. Memory objects in this
132 // isolate are updated synchronously.
133 void BroadcastSharedWasmMemoryGrow(Isolate* isolate) const;
134
135 // Remove all memory objects in the given isolate that refer to this
136 // backing store.
137 static void RemoveSharedWasmMemoryObjects(Isolate* isolate);
138
139 // Update all shared memory objects in this isolate (after a grow operation).
140 static void UpdateSharedWasmMemoryObjects(Isolate* isolate);
141#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
142
143 // Returns the size of the external memory owned by this backing store.
144 // It is used for triggering GCs based on the external memory pressure.
145 size_t PerIsolateAccountingLength() {
146 if (is_shared_) {
147 // TODO(titzer): SharedArrayBuffers and shared WasmMemorys cause problems
148 // with accounting for per-isolate external memory. In particular, sharing
149 // the same array buffer or memory multiple times, which happens in stress
150 // tests, can cause overcounting, leading to GC thrashing. Fix with global
151 // accounting?
152 return 0;
153 }
154 if (empty_deleter_) {
155 // The backing store has an empty deleter. Even if the backing store is
156 // freed after GC, it would not free the memory block.
157 return 0;
158 }
159 return byte_length();
160 }
161
162 uint32_t id() const { return id_; }
163
164 private:
165 friend class GlobalBackingStoreRegistry;
166
167 BackingStore(void* buffer_start, size_t byte_length, size_t max_byte_length,
168 size_t byte_capacity, SharedFlag shared, ResizableFlag resizable,
169 bool is_wasm_memory, bool is_wasm_memory64,
170 bool has_guard_regions, bool custom_deleter, bool empty_deleter);
171 BackingStore(const BackingStore&) = delete;
172 BackingStore& operator=(const BackingStore&) = delete;
173 void SetAllocatorFromIsolate(Isolate* isolate);
174
175 // Accessors for type-specific data.
176 v8::ArrayBuffer::Allocator* get_v8_api_array_buffer_allocator();
177 SharedWasmMemoryData* get_shared_wasm_memory_data() const;
178
179 void* buffer_start_ = nullptr;
180 std::atomic<size_t> byte_length_;
181 // Max byte length of the corresponding JSArrayBuffer(s).
182 size_t max_byte_length_;
183 // Amount of the memory allocated
184 size_t byte_capacity_;
185 // Unique ID of this backing store. Currently only used by DevTools, to
186 // identify stores used by several ArrayBuffers or WebAssembly memories
187 // (reported by the inspector as [[ArrayBufferData]] internal property)
188 const uint32_t id_;
189
190 union TypeSpecificData {
191 TypeSpecificData() : v8_api_array_buffer_allocator(nullptr) {}
192 ~TypeSpecificData() {}
193
194 // If this backing store was allocated through the ArrayBufferAllocator API,
195 // this is a direct pointer to the API object for freeing the backing
196 // store.
197 v8::ArrayBuffer::Allocator* v8_api_array_buffer_allocator;
198
199 // Holds a shared_ptr to the ArrayBuffer::Allocator instance, if requested
200 // so by the embedder through setting
201 // Isolate::CreateParams::array_buffer_allocator_shared.
202 std::shared_ptr<v8::ArrayBuffer::Allocator>
203 v8_api_array_buffer_allocator_shared;
204
205 // For shared Wasm memories, this is a list of all the attached memory
206 // objects, which is needed to grow shared backing stores.
207 SharedWasmMemoryData* shared_wasm_memory_data;
208
209 // Custom deleter for the backing stores that wrap memory blocks that are
210 // allocated with a custom allocator.
211 struct DeleterInfo {
212 v8::BackingStore::DeleterCallback callback;
213 void* data;
214 } deleter;
215 } type_specific_data_;
216
217 const bool is_shared_ : 1;
218 // Backing stores for (Resizable|GrowableShared)ArrayBuffer
219 const bool is_resizable_by_js_ : 1;
220 const bool is_wasm_memory_ : 1;
221 const bool is_wasm_memory64_ : 1;
222 bool holds_shared_ptr_to_allocator_ : 1;
223 const bool has_guard_regions_ : 1;
224 bool globally_registered_ : 1;
225 const bool custom_deleter_ : 1;
226 const bool empty_deleter_ : 1;
227};
228
229// A global, per-process mapping from buffer addresses to backing stores
230// of wasm memory objects.
231class GlobalBackingStoreRegistry {
232 public:
233 // Register a backing store in the global registry. A mapping from the
234 // {buffer_start} to the backing store object will be added. The backing
235 // store will automatically unregister itself upon destruction.
236 // Only wasm memory backing stores are supported.
237 static void Register(std::shared_ptr<BackingStore> backing_store);
238
239 private:
240 friend class BackingStore;
241 // Unregister a backing store in the global registry.
242 static void Unregister(BackingStore* backing_store);
243
244 // Adds the given memory object to the backing store's weak list
245 // of memory objects (under the registry lock).
246 static void AddSharedWasmMemoryObject(Isolate* isolate,
247 BackingStore* backing_store,
248 Handle<WasmMemoryObject> memory_object);
249
250 // Purge any shared wasm memory lists that refer to this isolate.
251 static void Purge(Isolate* isolate);
252
253 // Broadcast updates to all attached memory objects.
254 static void BroadcastSharedWasmMemoryGrow(Isolate* isolate,
255 const BackingStore* backing_store);
256
257 // Update all shared memory objects in the given isolate.
258 static void UpdateSharedWasmMemoryObjects(Isolate* isolate);
259};
260
261} // namespace internal
262} // namespace v8
263
264#endif // V8_OBJECTS_BACKING_STORE_H_
